Microssa

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • Microssa.Logger

  • public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for writing MatchingEngine events to a flatfile.
    See Also:
    MatchingEngine

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static java.lang.String FileName
      Path and file name of the log file.
      private java.io.FileOutputStream LogFile
      Logfile stream object.
      protected static Logger LoggerInstance
      Singleton instance of Logger.
      private static java.lang.String MatchReportFileName
      Path and file name of the match report file.
      private java.io.FileOutputStream MatchReportLogFile
      Match Report Logfile stream object.
      private boolean WriteMatchReport
      Whether we should write a match report file.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Logger()
      This is a singleton class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Logger getInstance()
      Accessor function for the instance.
      static void initialize()
      Creates a new Logger instance, verifies there is only one, and attempts to open the output file for writing.
      void write(java.lang.String s)
      Writes a string to the logfile with a prepended datetime.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Logger

        protected Logger()
        This is a singleton class. The constructor is Protected so it can never be instantiated from outside of the class.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public static void initialize()
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new Logger instance, verifies there is only one, and attempts to open the output file for writing.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is already a Logger instance, or if the output file cannot be open

      • getInstance

        public static Logger getInstance()
        Accessor function for the instance.
        Returns:
        An instance of Logger, or null if it was never initialized.

      • write

        public void write(java.lang.String s)
           throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a string to the logfile with a prepended datetime. We flush after each write in case the matching engine is abruptly stopped.
        Parameters:
        s - The string to be written
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the logfile write or flush fails

      • writeMatch

        public void writeMatch(java.lang.String s)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Writes a string to the match report with a prepended datetime. We flush after each write in case the matching engine is abruptly stopped.
        Parameters:
        s - The string to be written
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the match report write or flush fails
